item.title: Happy Thanksgiving ðŸ¦ƒ
item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving

I wish everybody a great day with their families and friends. I hope you can all meet in person and make up for last year. I’m grateful for having a family and friends, a roof over my head, and a fulfilling job.

Happy Turkey Day, or whatever suits your mood. Stay safe wherever you are and get some time for yourself.
